channel.title: Possibility guards can open doors when following me?
channel.description:
Hi,
I have a problem with guards following me, they follow me, but when u reach a door, I go through it, but the door closes behind me, and the guard stops following me, so he's not able to open the door, so I need to open the door again, and stay in the doorway, so he can follow me again...

item.description:
Dragunov2:

Hi,

I have a problem with guards following me, they follow me, but when u reach a door, I go through it, but the door closes behind me, and the guard stops following me, so he’s not able to open the door, so I need to open the door again, and stay in the doorway, so he can follow me again…

I remember that similar glitch in the original Half Life in Office Complex where the guard wouldn’t go through the door, it would close itself and he would stop following you.
